gen:link.msg:message: Gerapporteerde waarde van `TechnicalProvisionOther` aan het einde van de periode BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de gerapporteerde waarde van `TechnicalProvisionOther` aan het begin van de periode en de mutaties gedurende de periode, `TechnicalProvisionsOtherMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_TechnicalProvisionOtherEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_TechnicalProvisionOtherEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_TechnicalProvisionOtherStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_TechnicalProvisionOtherStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_TechnicalProvisionsOtherMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_TechnicalProvisionsOtherMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`TechnicalProvisionsOtherMovement` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_TechnicalProvisionsOtherMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_TechnicalProvisionsOtherMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfTechnicalProvisionsOtherMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfTechnicalProvisionsOtherMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfTechnicalProvisionsOtherMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfTechnicalProvisionsOtherMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
